title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() #>                                                                                      Library #> 1                       /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/_c/g4nn9vsd285_gcjw3nh8c8kr0000gn/T/Rtmpwqcbua/temp_libpathf4680a47b8 #>   n_packages #> 1        634 #> 2          1  # also can calculate sizes lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                      Library #> 1                       /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-arm64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/_c/g4nn9vsd285_gcjw3nh8c8kr0000gn/T/Rtmpwqcbua/temp_libpathf4680a47b8 #>   n_packages   lib_size #> 1        634 3426770415 #> 2          1      14393

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provide brief summary package libraries machine.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
